title: Excel Sheet Column Title
content:
Given a positive integer, return its corresponding column title as appear in an Excel sheet.

For example:

    1 -> A
    2 -> B
    3 -> C
    ...
    26 -> Z
    27 -> AA
    28 -> AB 
    ...

Example 1:

Input: 1
Output: "A"

Example 2:

Input: 28
Output: "AB"

Example 3:

Input: 701
Output: "ZY"
